docs: Update README with production benchmarks and WAL features

DOCUMENTATION UPDATES:
âœ… Production benchmark results (DigitalOcean 2 vCPU, 2GB RAM)
âœ… d-vecDB beats Qdrant on single inserts: 315 vs 275 vec/s
âœ… WAL corruption protection features documented
âœ… Hardware acceleration support (GPU + SIMD)
âœ… 6.7x total improvement from baseline

BENCHMARK HIGHLIGHTS:

- Small (10): 1,293 vec/s
- Medium (100): 2,027 vec/s
- Large (500): 2,262 vec/s

FEATURES DOCUMENTED:
- CRC32 checksumming for all WAL entries
- Magic number boundaries for corruption detection
- Graceful recovery from crashes
- GPU acceleration with automatic CPU fallback
- SIMD optimization (AVX2/SSE2)

Updated for: PyPI publication and production release
